// Sample transaction data generator for demo
const sampleTransactions = [
  {
    "transaction_id": "TXN001",
    "user_id": "USER123",
    "amount": 50000,
    "payment_method": "UPI",
    "merchant_id": "MERCH001",
    "location": "Mumbai, Maharashtra",
    "timestamp": new Date().toISOString(),
    "device_id": "DEV001",
    "ip_address": "192.168.1.100",
    "upi_id": "user123@paytm",
    "merchant_category": "Electronics"
  },
  {
    "transaction_id": "TXN002",
    "user_id": "USER123", 
    "amount": 45000,
    "payment_method": "UPI",
    "merchant_id": "MERCH002",
    "location": "Delhi, NCR",
    "timestamp": new Date(Date.now() - 300000).toISOString(),
    "device_id": "DEV002",
    "ip_address": "10.0.0.50",
    "upi_id": "user123@paytm",
    "merchant_category": "Jewelry"
  },
  {
    "transaction_id": "TXN003",
    "user_id": "USER456",
    "amount": 2000,
    "payment_method": "Card",
    "merchant_id": "MERCH003",
    "location": "Bangalore, Karnataka",
    "timestamp": new Date().toISOString(),
    "device_id": "DEV003",
    "ip_address": "172.16.0.10",
    "card_last_4": "1234",
    "merchant_category": "Food"
  }
];

const transaction = $input.all().length > 0 ? $input.all()[0].json : sampleTransactions[Math.floor(Math.random() * sampleTransactions.length)];

return [{
  json: transaction
}];
